file_path: Not specified in content, assumed load test file.
file_summary: This XML file represents an Apache JMeter test plan designed for performance testing a 'PetClinic' web application. It simulates user load to measure application responsiveness and stability under stress. The test plan configures a thread group to simulate 500 concurrent users, with a ramp-up period of 10 seconds, each user executing the defined test scenario 10 times. It includes a constant timer for pacing requests and sets up default HTTP parameters for connection. The core of the test plan involves a sequence of HTTP requests simulating various user actions such as browsing the homepage, viewing vets, finding and editing owner details, and adding new pets and visits. Dynamic counters are used to vary owner and pet IDs for different requests. The plan is set up to collect aggregated performance statistics, providing insights into transaction times, throughput, and error rates.
